title: The Water Cycle
description: Did you know that the water you drank today might be the same water a dinosaur drank a million years ago? In The Water Cycle, students will learn about the different stages of the water cycle and why the water cycle is important. This book provides detailed diagrams and photographs of the different stages of the water cycle. This book can also be used to teach students how to connect to prior knowledge and sequence events.
